room_title: Escape room "Crush Depth" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: This was so much fun!! The staff was excellent!

room_title: Escape room "Crush Depth" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: We traveled to Boston for a weekend of some fun and came across Trapology. We booked the room for Crush depth. This was a very elaborate room and you can tell that the staff put a lot of thought behind making this experience.Put your thinking caps on this is a real good one!!!

room_title: Escape room "Crush Depth" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: Did a double date with friends and got “Crush Depth”, awesome time, finished with 6 seconds left! You don’t realize until the end how much you’re learning about teamwork. Our facilitator Carollina was super enthusiastic and gave a great recap, since there are so many puzzles it’s hard to remember as you go. And great location, highly recommend.
